reviewTitle: Most Unique aesthetics , Nice workman ship, A perfect Balance of Price Vs Quality, Budget friendly
reviewDescription: I bought this Mini Sounbar last week since then i am using it with my laptop and Mobile Phone. It's super compact and Portable with a perfect balance of Sound Vs Price. Can be your best companion in car, Small trips, picnics, gatherings.Has got 4 modes FM/BT/USB/AUX, can be used as per one's convinience.RGB at the ends make top up the Gorgeousness.Totally fits in budget. Would recommend to buy and try.

reviewTitle: Good, value for money, good output
reviewDescription: I like sound quality. Value for money. Lighting effect is good. Bass quality is medium but not bad. Same can be improved. Rest all good including look. Sound is clear and good for video call.

At 50-60% volume getting more than 5 hours battery life, havent yet tested from a full 100% battery how long it would last. Volume is very loud at maximum but some sounds will start to distort. 70-80% sound is okay.Bass doesnt have much of a thump but its atleast clear and ok for the price. Vocals and trebles are decent.Got this because it was the cheapest 10w bt speaker with usb c charging, but they tell you in the instruction booklet to use 5v 1a charger for charging it, otherwise there is risk of burning the components inside. I dont know if they even make those anymore. The 5v 2a charger i had lying around and the cable that came with the speaker does the job of charging. Be careful of using more than a 5v2a charger, looks like the speaker lacks a chip inside that controls charging voltages. Use the provided cable to charge it too.Might as well get a micro usb speaker if its cheaper than 600, so you atleast dont need to be careful which charger to charge it with.
3 to 4 times used it was not working properly

reviewTitle: After 2 days with Amazon Basics, this audio device impresses with great sound, RGB lighting
reviewDescription: After two days with Amazon Basic, it's clear that this audio device offers exceptional value under ‚Çπ1,000. The sound quality is impressive, delivering clear and balanced audio. The most striking feature is the RGB lighting, which adds a dynamic and visually appealing element to the setup. Despite its affordable price, the build feels durable and comfortable for long sessions. A great choice for those who want both great sound and great aesthetics.

For this price point, I would say its a good product, I am just impressed with the audio quality, bass is good, audio is loud and clear.The things I don't like are the buttons are like kinda plasticky and there is no charge level indicator

This speaker disappointed me with its sound quality. Its large, its 10 w speakers but it produces zero base!I have brought few years back infinity speakers at same price range,  they were amazing. Unfortunately infinity does not make any more speakers. They are promoting jbls which are quiet expensive.The buttons on this which controls play pause, next track etc looks good but when u press them entire unit shakes, its flimsy!Button build quailty is poor. More that was disappointed by the sound output.Infinity, tribit, jbls, (boat have not tried might be good as well) these will give quality sound outputs.I wasted my money buying this. Noted there is no return policy. Only replacement with another same speaker!!! So don't make a mistake of investing in them.Amazon basics is like cheap prices for poor quality. I expected amazon basics will maintain quailty on products.
Speaker sounds good... Looks cool... Value for money... The buttons could have been better thought. Overall its a 5star
